import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios'; export default class sidenav extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ employee:[{ id:' ' }] } } componentDidMount() { axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/persons_manager/employee/") .then(res => { this.setState({employee:res.data}) console.log(res); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } render() { return (
{this.state.employee[0].display_name}
